card.name: A Few Trusty Lads
card.text: Playable only on your starting company in lieu of a minor item. Youmay not reveal an avatar. The company may contain 2 Orc leaders. All unique Orc-leaders in the company receive +3 EI against Orcs and you may start the game at one of their home sites. During your end-of-turn phase you may bring one resource or character from your sideboard to your play deck (or 3 to your discard pile). Discard this card if the company contains more than 2 unique leaders, a non-Orc leader, or more than 2 non-Orc character. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: A Worthy Substitute
card.text: Playable on a Darkhaven [K]. While this card is in play your characters at the site may transfer allies to other characters of the same or higher mind (or to a Ringwraith) as the controlling character.

card.name: Abduction
card.text: Playable during CvCC if your company has at least twice as many characters than opponent’s company. Instead of making a body check for 1 of opponent’s characters (or 2 Hobbits) place him with this card under the control of a non-wounded character in the company: both are considered “off to the side” and taken prisoner with the company. Discard this card if the controlling character becomes wounded; the prisoner(s) forms a company at his current or new site. This card can be stored along with the character at a Darkhaven [K], Dark-hold [D] or Shadow-hold [S]. Rescue attack: the duplicate of one of the site’s automatic-attacks (your choice). If any of your companies is at the site, prisoners may only be released after CvCC. Discard this card if no character is associated with this card at any time.

card.name: Abhorred Ring
card.text: Spirit Ring. Playable only with a gold ring and after a test indicates a Spirit Ring. -2 to bearer’s mind (to a minimum of 1). Bearer may tap to discard a hazard permanent-event played on his company or a character in his company. Bearer makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: All Else Is Conquered
card.text: Minion only. Playable during the site phase on a company at a version of a hero Haven [H], if the bearer of The One Ring is there. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled): Dwarves— 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess; Elves — 2 strikes with 15 prowess. You must engage in CvCC with any of opponents’ companies at the site (overriding any card effect; cannot be cancelled). Following these attacks, if opponent’s bearer of The One Ring is wounded, tap a character in the company to take control of The One Ring. Otherwise, tap your bearer of The One Ring and make a CC; if still in play afterwards you win the game.

card.name: Ancient Rite
card.text: Spirit-magic. Playable on a Ruins & Lairs [R] or Wose-hold by a spirit-magic user or a Wose character. All versions of the site gain an additional automatic-attack: Pûkel-creature — 2 strikes with 9 prowess (cancelled against your companies). Unless he is a Ringwraith, your Wose or spirit-magic user makes a CC modified by -3. Until this card is discarded, the site cannot be discarded or returned to the location deck. Discard this card if the associated attack is faced.

card.name: Ash-drake
card.text: Drake. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. May be played keyed to Gorgoroth and Nurn. If Drought is in play may also be played in Gap of Khand and Nuriag. May also be played keyed to a region affected by Awaken the Earth’s Fire.

card.name: Assassin
card.text: Men. 3 attacks (of one strike each) all against the same character. Attacker chooses defending character. One or two of these attacks may be cancelled by tapping one character (not the defending character) in the defender’s company for each attack cancelled.

attr.value: men. 3 attacks (of one strike each) all against the same character. attacker chooses defending character. one or two of these attacks may be cancelled by tapping one character (not the defending character) in the defender’s company for each attack cancelled.

you may discard this card to cancel all attacks from Mordor in Arms against one of your companies.

card.name: Betrayer's Heart
card.text: Playable on a non-unique detainment creature attack by Dúnedain, Dwarves, Hobbits, Men, or Woses (including an agent attack); this card counts as two against the hazard limit. The attack is treated as a normal attack, not detainment. If the attack is defeated, the defending player receives full kill mp, regardless of the presence of an asterisk (*). Place this card with the defeated attack.

card.name: Black Ring of Arda
card.text: Unique. Spirit Ring. Playable with a gold ring and only after a test indicates a Spirit Ring. Gives bearer warrior, scout, ranger, sage, and diplomat skills. Bearer must make a CC each time this card untaps. tap: if bearer is already a warrior to remain untapped against any strike this turn; tap: if already a scout to cancel a strike directed against any character in the company; tap: if already a ranger during organization phase to allow his company to move an extra region; tap: if already a sage to allow a character in his company to use magic this turn;tap: if already a diplomat to give +4 to an influence check he makes.

card.name: Black Steed
card.text: Horse. Playable at a tapped or untapped Border-hold [B] in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Cannot be controlled by an overt character. If each Ringwraith in a company controls a Black Steed, the company is in Black Rider mode. tap: cancel a strike from a non-automatic- attack against its bearer or itself. If each character in the company controls a horse ally, they may move 2 additional regions.

card.name: Blade of Sorcery
card.text: Playable on a Ringwraith company. For each successful strike in CvCC by a Ringwraith in the company, you may place a Morgul-knife or The Pale Sword on the defeated character instead of making a body check (character is still wounded); these may be taken from your discard pile if the Ringwraith bore a Morgul- blade or The Fiery Blade during CvCC this turn. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Bloodspike
card.text: Unique. Hoard Item. Weapon. May only be borne by a Troll. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+4 prowess to a maximum of 10 against Dúnedain and Men).

card.name: Bone Dragon
card.text: Magic. Shadow-magic. Undead. Playable only on a shadow-magic user at a tapped or untapped site where an at home Dragon manifestation has been defeated. Unless the shadow-magic user is a Ringwraith, he makes a CC at -4. Cannot be duplicated for an eliminated Dragon manifestation.

card.name: Bone-basher
card.text: Unique. Only playable at a site with an Orc automatic-attack. Weapon. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+4 if Doors of Night is in play) (to a maximum of 10); -2 to target’s body.

card.name: Bulrakur
card.text: Unique. Leader. Scara-hai. Black player only. +3 EI against Scara-hai Orcs. +2 prowess against all attacks that are not Dragon, Drake, Dwarf, Dúnadan or Pûkel-creature attacks. Cannot use any weapons, unless Counterfeit is played on him (for no other effect).

card.name: Caran-carach
card.text: Unique. Demon. Wolf. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to Southern Mirkwood. Any body check resulting from the attack is modified by +1 (unless the defending character bears any armor or a shield). As a short-event, one Wolf hazard creature may be played keyed to a Border-hold [B] this movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Cham-en-Faroth
card.text: Unique. Mind Ring. Playable on The Grimburgoth at any site where rings are playable (or at Dol Guldur if a manifestation of Khamûl the Easterling is in play). +2 on bearer’s CC from magic cards. +2 prowess against ringbearers in CvCC. Place any defeated creature affected by a sorcery card played on the company with this ring. For every 2 creatures placed with this card all creature attacks against the company suffer a -1 modification to prowess and body.

card.name: Creating Their Domain
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith. Your Ringwraith’s company may move with region movement to any site in the same region as one of his home sites. Bade to Rule is not discarded when moving through such a region. Additionally, if at one of his home sites you may play Black Rider and Heralded Lord on your Ringwraith and he may use any of his abilities as if at a Darkhaven [K].

card.name: Creature of an Older World
card.text: Winged. Playable on a Ringwraith at a tapped or untapped Dol Guldur or Minas Morgul (or at Barad-dûr if Dark Spires Rising isin play). Does not tap the site. If each Ringwraith in the company controls a Creature of an Older World the company is in Fell Rider mode. tap: cancel a strike against its controlling Ringwraith character or assign a strike from him during CvCC (regardless of his status). Return its controller to your hand if this ally leaves play. Discard if its controlling character moves and controls more than one copy of Creature of an Older World.You may include up to 9 copies of this card in your play deck and sideboard combined.

card.name: Curse the Baggins!
card.text: Black player only. Playable if you have Stinker at Dol Guldur (or Barad-dûr if you are Sauron). Place this card and Stinker off to the side; Stinker is concidered Prisoner at Dol Guldur. Each untap phase he must make a body check modified by +1; if still in play afterwards you may discard Stinker and take My Precious from your discard pile or play deck to your hand. If Stinker is eliminated place this card in your mp: it is worth 1 ally mp and your ring tests at Bag End are modified by +3.

card.name: Curse unto His Kin
card.text: Unique. Only playable by a Sauron player on a Dwarf, Dúnadan or Man character with a mind less than 8, if your free GI is greaterthan the character’s mind. Discard all corruption cards on target character; no corruption cards may be played on him. +3 to his CC, +1 to his body. Target character may not be discarded by his controlling character or returned to hand by hazard effects. The Sauron player’s GI is modified by -3 but he may opt to give a +1 or -1 to any roll bearer makes (before the roll). This card can only be discarded if bearer is removed from play. When this card is discarded, remove it from the game. If bearer is discarded, this card is placed “off to the side” with the character: he may be brought into play as if in hand.

card.name: Dark Defenders
card.text: A Ringwraith follower at a Darkhaven [K] to use his special ability as if he were your Ringwraith. Any Ringwraith follower tapping in this fashion requires 3 points of influence to control this turn (if no influence is available, you may not tap him in this fashion). Discard this card when your play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Dark Forges
card.text: Sage only during the site phase at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site. Sage may not untap until Dark Forges is stored at a Darkhaven [K]. During your organization phase, you may tap a sage at a Darkhaven [K] and discard a stored Dark Forges to retrieve any one or two non-unique non-hoard minor or major battle-gear or technology items from your discard pile. These must be placed under the control of characters in the sage’s company.

card.name: Dark Riders
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith at a Darkhaven [K], if your Ringwraith is in a mode. Discard all Ringwraith followers which are not in a mode. -6 to your GI (-3 if your are The Witch King). You may place one They Ride Together with this card; it is not discarded until this card is discarded. Discard this card when your play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Dark Spires Rising
card.text: Unique. Black player only. Playable during the site phase on Barad-dûr, if Foundations Remain is inverted. Tap acharacter with a mind greater than 5 at the site or discard this card. You may play Hold Rebuilt and Repaired at Barad-dûr and invert this card. If inverted, this card is worth 2 mp, all versions of Barad- dûr are now considered a Dark-hold [D] and cards normally storable at Barad-dûr may be stored there. All sites in Gorgoroth and Udûn are restored to their normal site type. Replace The Necromacer for either Sauron or The Lidless Eye (which may be taken from sideboard).

card.name: Dark Study
card.text: Sauron specific. Magic. Shadow-magic. Playable during CvCC. Choose an opposing hero character with a mind less than 6; if he is eliminated by a body check resulting from this CvCC place him “off to the side” with this card instead (otherwise discard this card). During each of your following organization phases, make a roll; if the result is greater than 7, bring the character into play (tapped) with this card at Dol Guldur. He is now considered an Undead minion character under your control with -1 to prowess, -2 to body, and requires 2 points of influence to control.

card.name: Dawnless Day
card.text: Unique. Sauron specific. Any Ringwraith and Sauron player may discard a mode card from the company during their organization phase and replace it with another mode card from hand. Aditionally, at the end of the organization phase, they may heal any Ringwraith (from wounded to tapped) or untap all Ringwraith follwers. During your organization phase rotate this card 90°; discard this card when rotated 180°.

card.name: Descendance
card.text: Trophy. Playable on the highest mind character (avatarif present) in a company after an attack from a non- detainment Maia creature, if all strikes have failed and the creature is still in play. May also be played on your avatar, if a strike against him from an opponent’s Wizard or Lord in CvCC has failed. Discard the Maia/Wizard/Lord if still in play; keep any stage cards in play and place any non-ally cards “off to the side”. Opponent may take his avatar from his discard pile to his hand during the next turn after the play of this card. This card yields trophy mp.

card.name: Do as I Say
card.text: Playable on a leader at the same site as a War-lord you control. Fallen Saruman may also play this card if he has Bad Company in play. The leader’s EI is 0 and he may not have any followers. The character is not considered to be a leader while bearing this card. Return any command cards to your hand. You may discard this card at any time, if target character is in the company with a War-lord.

card.name: Dorwinrim School of Diplomacy
card.text: Lore. Playable on a non-overt, non-avatar diplomat during the site phase at Riavod, if you have Men of Dorwinion in play. Tap the diplomat. Target diplomat may tap and discard any treasure from the company or Gifts as Given of Old from hand to cancel a Dúnadan, Dragon, Dwarf, Elf, Man, Orc or Slayer attack. Any treasure item may be discarded instead of the listed items for Token of Goodwill. Additionally, target diplomat need not tap to play Ruse or Ready to His Will.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ear in the King's Court
card.text: Playable on a Dúnadan if opponent has Return of the Kingin play, or on a Dwarf if opponent has King under the Mountain or Lord of Dwarrowdelf in play. While your Dúnadan bearer is at the same site as a manifestation of Aragorn II, or your Dwarf bearer is at the same site as The Lord of Dwarrowdelf or The King under the Mountain Dwarf, Information is playable at the (tapped) site, all factions in play at the site are worth 1 less mp, and this card is worth 2 mp. Discard this card during your end-of-turn phase if target character is not at that same site.Cannot be duplicated for a given race.

card.name: Failed Devices
card.text: Playable on a Dwarven Ring or manifestationof The One Ring, when the ring is tapped. This card can be played at any time during opponent’s turn. A Ringwraith’s company in a mode may use region movement to move to the ringbearer’s current non-Free-hold [F] site. Cannot be duplicated on a given ring. Discard when any playdeck is exhausted.

card.name: Favoured by the Eye
card.text: Black player only. Playable on your avatar at Dol Guldur,if you have more mp of unique items and killed creatures than any opponent. Target character becomes a leader and may control any number of command cards; these do not modify his EI. Threats is not considered a skill card for your avatar and he may play Threats on any influence attempt (as if influencing a faction) or detainment strike (modify the roll by adding his prowess to a maximum of 6).Discard this card if Favoured by The Eye is played by another player. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Feagwath
card.text: Unique. Black player only. Leader. Can use shadow-magic. +2 EI against Orcs and Undead. tap: cancel a non-unique Undead attack against his company.

card.name: Flaming Torch
card.text: tap: modify the prowess of an Animal, Spider,Wolf or Awakened Plant attack by -2. Alternatively, a ranger bearer may tap this item to cancel a non-automatic Awakened Plant attack.

card.name: Forged Below
card.text: Sage only. Playable during the site phase at any Under-deeps Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. Tap a sage and place this card on a battle-gear item a character in the company bears. If the item is a weapon, it gives an extra +1 prowess; if an armor, shield or helmet, it gives an extra +1 body. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Foundations Remain
card.text: Unique. Black player only. You may start with this card in lieu of a minor item. When Hold Rebuilt and Repaired is played on Barad-dûr, it is never discarded or returned to the site deck and you may tapap 3 characters with at least 3 different skills during the site phase at Barad-dûr to invert this card. If inverted, this card is worth 2 mp and you may play unique resources at sites in Mordor.

card.name: Fruitless Victory
card.text: Playable after a non-unique hazard creature was defeated by your opponent the same movement/hazard phase. Make a roll for the creature; if the result is greater than the creature’s mp plus 5, it is removed from your opponent’s mp and shuffled into your play deck.

card.name: Gaurhir
card.text: Unique. Werewolf. Black player only. +1 prowess if Wake of War is in (+2 if Doors of Night is in play). +2 EI against Scara-hai. Can use spirit-magic and sorcery. Glance of Arien may be played on him as if he were a Balrog.

card.name: Gaze Fixed
card.text: Sauron specific. Stolen Knowledge. Tap one of your characters at a site where an opponent’s company is present to place this card and one Eye of Sauron in play with opponent’s company. If with a company: +1 to the company’s hazard limit and -1 to any CC made by characters in the company. Eye of Sauron cannot be discarded until this card is discarded. If the company moves, opponent may make a roll at the end of the movement/hazard phase and add 1 for each scout in the company and 1 for each region moved through. If the result is greater than 13 discard this card. When this card is discarded place it in your mp (it is worth 1 mp). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Goblin-miner
card.text: +1 prowess against Dwarves. Discard on a body check of 7. Costs no influence to control if controlled by an Orc or Troll leader bearing a Whip. +1 to his company’s Under-deeps movement rolls.

card.name: Gorfaur the Lame
card.text: Unique. Troll. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to Dol Guldur. May also be played following an Orc or Troll attack in a Shadow-land [s] or at a Shadow-hold [S]. If keyed to a region against a company containing less than 3 characters and allies, a character or ally in the company may tap to cancel the attack.

card.name: Grimbúrz
card.text: Unique. Playable at Laek Goak; also playable atany Ruins & Lairs [R] in Wilderland by the bearer of Cham-en-Faroth, if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: The Grimburgoth (+3), any faction playable at Dol Guldur (-2) tap: let a creature in opponent’s discard pile attack 1 of your companies, if that creature has already attacked the company this turn.

card.name: Growing Shadow
card.text: Sauron or War-lord only. Playable on a region card, if any of its adjacent Shadow-land [s] or Dark-domain [d] regions contains either your War-lord’s home site (Dol Guldur for The Necromancer) or a site where you have a unique faction in play. Target region is also considered a Shadow-land. Discard this card if you do not have such faction in play, or if your War-lord is at a site more than 3 regions away from his home site.

card.name: Guldurim
card.text: Unique. Playable at Dol Guldur if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Grimbúrz (+2), Necromancer’s Body Guard (-2), Orcs of Dol Guldur (-2). Once in play, the number required to influence this faction is 0.

card.name: Hatred
card.text: Playable on a non-Ringwraith minion character. Choose a type: Dúnadan, Dwarf, Elf, Hobbit, Man, Orc or Troll. The character receives +1 prowess against the chosen type. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Helm of Madness
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Only playable by a Man or Dúnadan at Mount Gundabad. + 2 to body (to a maximum of 10) and + 2 EI. If bearer is a Man or Dúnadan: tap: assign a strike to bearer instead of to another character. Bearer’s company may initiate CvCC regardless of their alignment. tap: assign all strikes in CvCC.

card.name: Hirbrand
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against factions playable at his home sites. Healing cards Hirbrand uses affect all characters in his company.

card.name: Houses of Lamentation
card.text: Playable on a non-Under-deeps Dark-hold [D]. The site becomes a Darkhaven [K] for the purposes of healing. You may store a character taken prisoner at this site; you may take an Information resource to your hand from your discard pile when you store such a character (or any resource playable at Bag End if a Hobbit). Discard when the site leaves active play.

card.name: Hurog
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Leader. Discard on a body check of 8. +1 prowess against Dwarves and Men. +2 EI against Orcs. tap: give +1 prowess to all Orc characters in his company if at or moving to a site in Wilderland.

card.name: Ill East Wind
card.text: Environment. Until end of turn Doors of Night is considered to be in play. Return any cards that can only be played if Doors of Night is not in play to their owner’s hand.

card.name: Instilled with Malice
card.text: Ritual. Playable by an overt sage or spirit-magic user during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. Tap the sage, place this card on a non-unique minor or major weapon in the same company, and choose 1 of the following: Dúnadan, Dwarf, Elf or Man. The weapon gives +2 prowess against the chosen type. Sage makes a CC modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given weapon.

card.name: Interrogation
card.text: Playable on a company during site phase if any characters are taken Prisoner with the Company, or at the site where an opponent’s character is taken prisoner. Opponent must reveal his hand to you. Store this card at a Haven [HK] and name 2 cards; if opponent has these cards in his hand he must discard them. When this card is stored it is worth 2 mmp and while opponent has any ring items in play all your ring tests are modified by +2. If you have 10 P or more or your opponent is not a Wizard this card may also be played as a hero resource.May not be duplicated for a given character taken prisoner.

card.name: Leärdinoth
card.text: Unique. Can use spirit-magic. + 1 EI against factions and characters playable at his home sites.

card.name: Legions of the Dark Lord
card.text: As a permanent-event this card is played in your mp. You receive this card’s mp when you have at least 5 Man, Dúnadan and/or Orc factions in play at sites in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Cannot be duplicated as a permanent-event. As short-event, if you have at least one Man, one Dúnadan and one Orc faction in play at a site in Mordor or its adjacent regions, removes all non- Dragon factions from your discard pile and shuffle them into your play deck.

card.name: Lomëlindë
card.text: Unique. Agent. Agent only: tap: attack a company during its movement/hazard phase with +1 strikes.

card.name: Lure of Magic
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-Ringwraith character who can use sorcery, spirit-magic or shadow-magic. Target character makes a CC each time a magic resource is played on a character in his company. During his organization phase, the character may tap to attempt to remove this card by making a roll. If the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Mace-master
card.text: Warrior-only. Playable on a Dwarf, Troll, Wose or The Witch- king, if bearing a flail, hammer or mace (e.g. Bone Basher). Before resolving a creature attack (except creatures where each character faces a strike) with equal or less strikes than the prowess bonus the flail, hammer or mace gives, bearer may tap the item to face the creature as though he were a one-character company. If this strike is defeated, the attack receives -2 prowess and -2 body and bearer makes a CC; if ineffectual the attack resolves normally; if succesfull bearer is wounded (no body check required). This card gives 2 CP to a minion bearer.

card.name: Marauding Band of Orcs
card.text: Playable on an Orc leader. Discard if the company contains more than one non-Orc character. There is no maximum to the number of characters in this company. Orcs with a mind less than 3 in the company require no influence to control. There is no limit to the number of characters that may be played with this company on a given turn (if you are a Balrog player the limit is 5 characters). Attacks against this company may not be cancelled.

card.name: Marching Companies
card.text: Black player only. Playable on a company. You may place a Tribal Banner with a leader in the company during the organization phase; each leader bearing a Tribal Banner may be in the company with other leaders. If the company faces an attack and the leader controls any followers, you may opt to have the leader and his followers face the attack as if they were a separate company.

card.name: Master Smith
card.text: Unique. Playable on an Elf sage with a mind greater than 5 at a Darkhaven [K] (or in your starting company in lieu of a minor item). When at a Darkhaven or Dark-hold [D], bearer may tap and discard a Dark Forges from the company to play a non-unique lesser ring with a character in the company. Discard this card if there is a character with a higher mind in the company outside a Darkhaven.tap: take an Ore card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Miruimor

card.name: Mockery
card.text: Playable on one of your opponent’s unwounded non-avatar hero warrior characters, whose current site lists your Ringwraith’s current Darkhaven [K] site as the nearest Darkhaven. Target character must engage in CvCC with your Ringwraith at the beginning of the organization phase (as if single character companies); he may cancel this CvCC by tapping. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Núrnen
card.text: Environment. Nurn is considered also a Coastal Sea [c] region for the purpose of playing non-unique hazards. While The Reach of Ulmo is in play, this card is not discarded as normal (during opponent’s next movement/hazard phase).

card.name: On Their Master's Errand
card.text: Nazgûl hazard creatures may be played keyed to any region containing a Dark-hold [D]. Additionally, Nazgûl hazard creatures may be played keyed to a region containing a Shadow-hold [S] where a unique minion faction is in play, or a Ruins & Lairs [R] where a Dragon-faction is in play.

card.name: Orc Archer
card.text: May also be brought into play at any Orc-hold, if an overt leader is present. Discard on a body check result of 7. tap: give 1 strike from an attack (or in CvCC) -1 to prowess and body.

card.name: Orc Battalion
card.text: Orcs. Before strikes are assigned, make a roll, adding the company size and subtracting 1 for each scout in the company. If the result is less than 7, the attack is cancelled. Each character faces one strike with 8 prowess. The attack receives +3 prowess if keyed to a Dark-domain [d].

card.name: Orc Garrison
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company that can legally move to a mountain region. A Fallen- wizard may only play this card if he has A Striden Spawn in play. This card is used as a site card in a mountain region: [S], draw 2/2. A Few Recruits may be played at this site as if you were a Balrog player. Discard if you don’t have a company at the site. Alternatively, playable on a Shadow-hold [S]. The site is not discarded or returned to the location deck until this card is discarded. Discard this card if an opponent’s company enters the site.

card.name: Orc Grunt
card.text: May also be brought into play at any Orc-hold, if an overt leader is present. Discard on a body check result of 9. +1 prowess if there are at least 2 other Orcs in his company.

card.name: Orc-cuirass
card.text: Unique. Armor. Orc only: +1 to prowess and+3 to body (to a maximum of 9). If borne by a leader, he cannot be discarded by a body check and receives +1 EI for every 2 Orc factions you have in play.

card.name: Orc-endurance
card.text: Playable on a company with an overt leader. This card may also be played on a starting company in lieu of a minor item.If an Orc in the company bears Orc-pouch, you may play Orc-draughts or Orc-liquor from your sideboard whenever you are allowed to play an additional minor item. Additionally, you may discard Orc-draughts or Orc- liquor from the company to give +2 to all rolls for Orcs in the company that are not body checks but use the body value to determine the result, or for Where There is a Whip.

card.name: Orc-pouch
card.text: Tap bearer and discard Orc-pouch to replace it with a minor item from your discard pile or sideboard; item must be a startable minor item. If bearer is Radbug, you may take two minor items (no Orc-pouch) instead. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Orcs of Nurn
card.text: Unique. card.name: Origins Revealed
card.text: Stolen Knowledge. Sage only at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site to place this card with a hero item in the same company. Target item is now worth full mp and its CP is doubled. Additionally, if the item is a battle-gear item, no longer ignore its card text.

card.name: Overlord of Dol Guldur
card.text: Place this card on Khamûl the Ringwraith if in play asa War-lord and at Dol Guldur. Khamûl may play Black Rain as if he were a sage. You may place a Black Rain from hand with an opponent’s character instead of making a body check for a failed strike against Khamûl in CvCC: the character is considered taken prisoner with the company (Black Rain is considered the host resource). tap: take a character manifestation of Dwar of Waw or Uvatha the Horseman from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Phantom Devised by Wizardry
card.text: Shadow-magic. Choose an opponent’s non-avatar character at the same site as your shadow-magic user: character must make a CC modified by -5. If he fails, he splits from the company and is placed at a site in the same or an adjacent region (ignore other effects). Unless he is a Ringwraith, your shadow-magic user makes a CC modified by -4.

card.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
card.text: Playable on a non-Black player’s company moving toDol Guldur, the Sulfur-deeps, the Under-courts, or a site in Gorgoroth or Nurn. The hazard limit against this company is increased by 1 for every Nazgûl permanent-event in play. All characters moving to or at the site have their prowess and body modified by -1. Additionally, all positive modifiers to CC resulting from sources other than modifiers listed on the character’s card are cancelled until the end of the turn.

card.name: Raised Again
card.text: Ritual. Tap a sage to untap an item in his company. Alternatively, if the item has a skill specific use, any character in the company with that skill may tap to untap the item. Character tapping makes a CC.

card.name: Ransom
card.text: Playable on a non-overt character facing a strike from a non-automatic, non- detainment Man or Slayer attack (except Pick-pocket or Thief). If the strike is successful, target character is not wounded but taken prisoner at the nearest Border-hold [B], Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] (hazard player’s choice). Rescue-attack: Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess.

attr.value: Port on Sea of Rhûn. Any horse ally may be transferred to other characters in the company during the organization phase.

card.name: Ring-drawn
card.text: Playable on a Ringwraith. Discard Catch an Elusive Scent from hand to take a ring item playable at the Ringwraith’s site from your discard pile to your hand. Additionally, for each Ringwraith in the company that taps you may move one region with region movement to a site where rings are playable or a ringbearer is present. tDiscard this card to untap the Ringwraith, if at a site where an opponent’s ringbearer is present. Cannot be duplicated on a given Ringwraith.

card.name: Scara-hai
card.text: Unique. Playable at Durthang if you have a sage and an Orc leader at the site, if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: Scara-hai (+2), any wolf ally in the company (+1). This faction is worth 3 mp if you have a company containing a Scara-hai present at a site in Gondor or if Scara-hai are present in a region in Gondor. This faction is also considered a Wolf faction.

card.name: Second in Command
card.text: Playable on a non-unique Orc leader. May also be played in your starting company in lieu of a minor item. The leader may be in the company with another leader of a higher mind and gains an additional home site: any Shadow-hold [S] Orc-hold. Discard this card if no leader with a higher mind is in his company.

card.name: Sharpen Up
card.text: Tap the bearer of a Saw-toothed Blade during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R] and play this with the Saw-toothed Blade. Saw-toothed Blade receives +1 prowess (+3 against Elves and Maia). Cannot be duplicated on a given Saw-toothed Blade.

card.name: Slyardach
card.text: Unique. Demon. 1 strike. Playable keyed to Sarn Goriwing. If Reaching Shadow is in play Slyardach may be played keyed to any non-Haven [H] ] G], non-Free-hold [F] site in Mirkwood. If played as the first creature this movement/hazard phase attacker chooses defending characters. +1 to any resulting body checks of non-avatar characters.

card.name: Spiders Huge and Horrible
card.text: Disease. Corruption. Bearer makes a CC modified by -1 whenever his company faces a Spider attack. During his organization phase, the character may tap to attempt to remove this card by making a roll; if the result is greater than 5, discard this card.

card.name: The Ashdurbuk
card.text: Unique. Playable on a unique Orc leader at a Shadow-hold [S] in Wilderland or its adjacent regions. Target character may control 2 command cards (these are not returned to hand automatically); if bearing a Whip he suffers no modification to his EI from these. Discard if another Orc leader with a higher mind is in play.

card.name: The Goblins Are upon You!
card.text: Playable on a company facing an attack, if it contains at least 2 Orc characters. All Orcs in the company receive +1 prowess (+2 against Dwarves) and -1 body against this attack and the next attack. Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

card.name: The Iron-pit
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an Under-deeps Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The site loses all automatic-attacks. If a company at this site has played Legendary Stair this turn, you may discard a Blasting Fire or Liquid Fire from the company to make one non-unique battle- gear major item playable here until the end of turn (even if the site tapped). Discard this card when the site leaves active play.

card.name: The Mornarturi
card.text: Playable if you are Sauron, Adûnaphel, Akhôrahil, or the Witch-king, and you have a Dúnadan faction in play. Your Dúnadan characters may form companies with Orcs, Trolls, Undead and Ringwraith characters. These Dúnadan characters must always be the highest mind character in the company, and the company may not include another leader.

card.name: The Necromancer
card.text: Black player only. Manifestation of the Lidless Eye. Playable if you have not revealed a Ringwraith. You are Sauron, not a Ringwraith. You may not play Ringwraith characters. +3 to your GI. You may bring a resource or character from your sideboard to your play deck during your organization phase (or 3 to your discard pile). You may play agent characters as normal minion characters and all your agent characters require 1 less mind to control (to a minimum of 3). All your overt companies have their hazard limit increased by 1 (to a minimum of 3). Dol Guldur receives an additional automatic-attack against all other non-black players’ companies: Maia — 1 strike with 21 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Necromancer's Bodyguard
card.text: Unique. Necromancer specific. Playableat Dol Guldur if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Black Trolls (+2), Guldurim (-2), Orcs of Dol Guldur (-2). Once in play, the number to influence this faction is 0.

card.name: The Slow Torment of Years
card.text: Sauron specific. Playable on an opponent’s character normally worth 2 mp or more taken prisoner with the company. If target character is at Dol Guldur (or Barad- dûr if Dark Spires Rising is in play) during your site phase make a body check and rotate this card 90°; all of opponent’s characters in play must make a CC modified by -1 for each time rotated (maximum of 4). If target character is eliminated place this card in opponent’s mp: it is worth -2 mp. Discard this card if target character is not taken prisoner.

card.name: Their Horror Spreads before Them
card.text: Playable after your Ringwraith’s company has defeated an Elf, Man, Dwarf or Dúnadan creature attack. Place the creature with this card. All further attacks of the same type as the defeated creature against this company have their prowess reduced by 1.

card.name: Tribute to Sauron
card.text: Sauron specific. Playable on a Border-hold [B] by an untapped diplomat in a covert company. Tap the diplomat. This site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. A Wizard or Lord at the site may tap during the site phase to discard this card from faction or site.

card.name: Trophy-belt
card.text: May only be borne by an Orc or Troll. You may place any trophies the character bears with this item. If there are any trophies with Trophy- belt it cannot be transfered (unless bearer is eliminated). When bearer has more trophies than other characters in the company, he must always face the first strike of any attack that does not choose defending characters (regardless of his status). When this card has 3 mp worth of trophies, the bearer becomes a leader (if not already) and this item may be stored at a site where you have a unique Orc or Troll faction in play for 2 mp.

card.name: Ukôg the Lame
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Leader. Discard on a body check of 7 or 8. +2 prowess against Orcs. +1 EI against Orcs and Trolls. His company may normally move only 3 regions. tap: after defeating a strike in CvCC to give -2 body to opponent’s character.

card.name: Ulrac
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against characters and factions playable in Harrhûn and its adjacent regions.

card.name: Under His Domination
card.text: Playable on a character taken prisoner at a Dark-hold [D]. Make a roll: if the result is greater than the character’s mind (+3 for Hobbits), the character becomes a minion agent controlled by the hazard player. Discard all other hazard permanent-events on the agent. This card cannot be targeted by resource events. During the organization phase, a sage at the same site as the character may tap to attempt to remove this card. Make a roll; add 1 for each additional sage or diplomat in the company that taps in support: if the result plus the character’s mind is greater than 10, discard this card; the character joins the sage’s company and is controlled by the sage’s controlling player.

card.name: Valleys Have Ears
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith. Tap your Ringwraith during the organization phase to look at a number of cards from the top of any play deck equal to double the number of factions you have in play at sites in his current region or regions adjacent to this. If your own play deck, you may choose and take one of these cards to hand; return the others to the top of the play deck in any order you choose.

card.name: Vampire
card.text: Demon. 1 strike. Flying. Playable only against non-black players’ companies. Cannot be cancelled cards requiring a scout or ranger skill. May also be played on a company that has faced a non-detainment Nazgûl or Spawn attack this turn.

card.name: Virsh
card.text: Unique. Scara-hai. Discard on a body check of 7 or 8. tap: during the site phase at an Orc-hold, if Host of Bats is in play or Swarm of Bats is played on his company, to play Poison from your discard pile or hand (tap the site if untapped).

card.name: We Are Fighting Uruk-hai!
card.text: Playable on a company containing an Uruk-hai facing an attack. All Uruk-hai in the company receive +2 prowess and -1 body against the attack. Cannot be duplicated against a given attack.

card.name: Weapons of Morgul
card.text: Unique. During your organization phase you may discard a magic card to take up to 3 of the following cards (one copy of each card) from your play deck (reshuffle) or discard pile to your hand: Helm of Fear, Morgul- blade, The Fiery Blade, or an item only playable on your Ringwraith. If you are Sauron you may search for any Ringwraith specific item.

card.name: Widuskapin Ritual
card.text: Playable on Woodmen-town. Discard a minor item to heal (from wounded to untapped) a non-overt, non-Ringwraith character at Woodmen-town. Alternatively, discard this card to heal (from wounded to untapped) a character anywhere whose home site is Woodmen-town. Discard this card when Woodmen-town is discarded or returned to the location deck.

card.name: Wolf-den
card.text: Playable on a Darkhaven [K], Dark-hold [D] or Shadow-hold [S], if you have a Wolf faction in play and an Orc faction in play at the site. Discard this card if you don’t have these factions in play. Once per organization phase you may search your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) and take a wolf ally to your hand. Additionally, your wolf allies at this site heal from wounded to untapped during your untap face. Discard this card if the site leaves active play.

card.name: Wraiths of Nurn
card.text: Unique. Playable at Urlurtsu Nurn if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Ringwraith (+4), shadow-magic user (+2), spirit-magic user (+2). tap: untap your Ringwraith if at or moving to a site where an opponent's company is present. Every time a creature or characters is eliminated by your Ringwraith bearing a Morgul-blade or The Fiery Blade place them under this faction instead of your mp pile (the creature or character still gives normal kill points). This faction yields an additional mp for every card placed under it. Discard this faction if opponent plays Banishment at Urlurtsu Nurn (as if the site had an Undead automatic-attack)
